lines.text: Professor of Neurology and Neurosciences
Daniel B. Drachman
Director, Neuromuscular Unit
Education
Columbia College
A.B.
New York University College of Medicine
M.D.
Medicine
Research and Professional Experience
Intern, Beth Israel Hospital, Boston, MA., Internal Medicine
Assist. Resident and Resident, Harvard Neurol. Unit, Boston City Hosp.
Resident in Neuropathology, Harvard Neurol. Unit, Boston City Hosp.
Teaching Fellow in Neurology, Harvard University
Clinical and Research Associate, NIH
Assistant Professor of Neurology, Tufts University School of Medicine
Associate Professor of Neurology, Johns Hopkins Univ., School of Med.
1974-Present
t Professor of Neurology, Johns Hopkins University, School of Medicine
1983-Present Professor of Neurosciences, Johns Hopkins Univ., School of Medicine
Honors
Phi Beta Kappa, Columbia College, 1952
Summa Cum Laude, Columbia College, 1952
Founders' Day Award, New York University, 1956
Alpha Omega Alpha Society New York University, 1956
John F. Sullivan Visiting Professor, Tufts University, 1979
Carrell-Krusen Lecturer, University of Texas, Dallas 1980
Kittredge Lecturer, Stanford University Medical Center, 1982
Starkman Lecturer, University of Toronto, 1982
Grass Lecturer - Neuroscience Society, 1983
Sigma Xi Lecturer - Jefferson Medical College, Philadelphia, 1983
Jacob Javits Award 1986
Myasthenia Gravis Foundation - Physician's Award, 1988
Sackler Visiting Professor, Cornell Medical Center, 1992
Hurst Brown Visiting Professor, University of Toronto, 1993
Publications. The following references are representative of more than 190 publications.
Selected references from 40 published during the past 4 years listed below, followed by
earlier key references on MG.
Alderson K, Pestronk A, Yee W-C, Drachman DB (1989) Silver cholinesterase immuno-
cytochemistry: A new neuromuscular junction stain. Muscle & Nerve 12:9-14.
McIntosh KR, Drachman DB, Kuncl RW (1989) Antigen-specific suppressor macrophages
induced by culture with cyclosporin A plus acetylcholine receptor. J Neuroimmunol
Pestronk A, Adams RN, Cornblath D, Kuncl RW, Drachman DB, Clawson LL (1989)
Patterns of serum antibodies to GM1 and GD1a gangliosides in ALS. Ann Neurol
Avila OA, Drachman DB, Pestronk AP (1989) Neurotransmission regulates stability of
acetylcholine receptors at the neuromuscular junction. J Neurosci 9:2902-2906.
Lipsky NG, Drachman DB, Pestronk A, Shih P-J (1989) Neural regulation of mRNA for
the a-subunit of acetylcholine receptors: Role of neuromuscular transmission. Exp
Schwimmbeck PL, Dyrberg T, Drachman DB, Oldstone MBA (1989) Molecular mimicry
and myasthenia gravis: An autoimmune site of the acetylcholine α-subunit that has
biologic activity and reacts immunochemically with herpes simplex virus. J Clin
Investigation 84:1174-1180.
Rothstein JD, Tsai B, Kuncl RW, Clawson LL, Cornblath RR, Drachman DB, Pestronk A,
Stauch BL, Coyle JT (1990) Abnormal excitatory animo acid metabolism in
amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. Ann Neurol 28:18-25.
